overview: A tale of five adventurers back on the boards. Their passion: the most beautiful summits in the world and the freedom to ride them. This year, they decided to change the practice, minimizing their CO2 emissions and finding ways to stay as neutral as possible in a changing nature.  Determined to return to basics, they traveled for two months the Swiss and French Alps through valleys near their homes. Here is their message.
tagline: Step forward through the legendary Alps
title: Shelter
